name: Skyward Blade
title: Sky-Piercing: Skyward Blade
desc: The sky-piercing fang. With nemesis vanquished, the wind dragon fell into a deep slumber.\nCenturies passed, and Dvalin's sacrifice was all but forgotten by Mondstadt.\nA prayer, this sword is. May Dvalin's name be restored.
inPlayDescription:
The character deals +1 DMG.
Once per Round: This character's Normal Attacks deal +1 additional DMG.

skills.desc:
The character deals +1 DMG.
Once per Round: This character's Normal Attacks deal +1 additional DMG.
(Only Sword Characters can equip this. A character can equip a maximum of 1 Weapon)
